mdRecord.dcterms:title: Centrifuge
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Shelton Electric Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Exposed centrifuge with two aluminum test tube holders and two glass test tubes. Plate affixed to centrifuge reads "Shelton Electric Company. New York-Chicago No. S273880 Volts 110, cycles 60. Manufactured by the General Electric Co. U.S.A."
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
Donated by Kal and Julie Howard [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus
